meanings.definition: A tract of open uncultivated upland; a moor.
meanings.sent1: The sheep grazed peacefully on the muirs.
meanings.sent2: The hikers enjoyed the scenic views of the muirs during their trek.
meanings.sent3: The muirs seemed to whisper secrets to the passing clouds.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the muirs turned into a golden sea of tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The muirs stretched out endlessly, like a vast green blanket covering the earth.

meanings.sent1: The muirs were shrouded in mist on that foggy morning.
meanings.sent2: Bird watchers often visit the muirs to spot rare species.
meanings.sent3: The muirs looked like a giant green sponge soaking up the rain.
meanings.sent4: The muirs stood silent and still, like a forgotten land of mystery.
meanings.sent5: The muirs whispered tales of ancient times to those who dared to listen.
